Name: Default Judgment, Duplicate Notice
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the City of New York, in relation to providing for the mailing of duplicate notice of violations with every notice sent to vehicle owners prior to issuance of a default judgment.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

    	Section 1.  Section 19-207 of the administrative code of the city of New York, is amended by adding thereto a new subdivision c, to follow subdivision b, to read as follows:
    	c.  	A copy of the notice of violation shall be sent to the owner prior to issuance of a default judgment as provided for in subdivision b of this subsection.
    	ï¿½2. 	This local law shall take effect sixty days after enactment.

    	
Int. 313
